title: The Coconut tree
creator_credit: Hermann Schlenker and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Examines aspects of life in the Pacific Islands. The coconut is the islands’ only export and the coconut palm is also esential for the people’s immediate livelihood. Shows the products derived from this source by the islanders. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
